description: This exquisite, newly renovated townhouse, offers a perfect blend of luxury and practicality, nestled in a fantastic suburban neighborhood. With over 1,600 square feet of living space, this home is ideal for families seeking room to grow while enjoying modern comforts. The expansive master suite is a true retreat, complete with a walk-in closet and spacious bathroom. Each bedroom is generously sized, making this home ideal for larger families. With stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and refinished cabinetry, the kitchen truly shines. Numerous upgrades include a new concrete deck, washer, dryer and laminate floors make this home turnkey ready. Situated just minutes from schools, parks, shopping, and dining this home offers the ultimate in suburban convenience.
